candidates.name: Alezix Heneti
candidates.why_elect: I have served community and business 38 years.
candidates.why_stand: I know Albany Ward is the best area to live in.

candidates.name: Julia Parfitt
candidates.why_elect: I believe my experience as the Chairperson of the Hibiscus and Bays Local Board and a former North Shore City councillor representing the Albany ward, has given me an excellent understanding of the issues we face. I am hardworking and effective at ensuring our needs are recognised and met.
candidates.why_stand: I am standing because I believe it's time for change. After 9 years I am extremely disappointed to see what little focus our ward, Auckland's fastest growing, has within council and council budgets. I will work collaboratively within council to resolve issues rather than just highlighting them.
